description:
It`s sleepover night at the preschool!  The class is making curry, just like you`d make at home. But Tsumugi`s "at-home curry" is different than usual. It`s got raisins!  Kohei decides to make Tsumugi the special keema curry that her mother used to make.  But how will Tsumugi react to this memory of mommy?
Source: crunchyroll
